metadata.Title: CVE-2022-1976 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: A flaw was found in the Linux kernelâ€™s implementation of IO-URING. Thisflaw allows an attacker with local executable permission to create a stringof requests that can cause a use-after-free flaw within the kernel. Thisissue leads to memory corruption and possible privilege escalation.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
